11#ifndef API_RTC_EVENT_LOG_OUTPUT_FILE_H_
12#define API_RTC_EVENT_LOG_OUTPUT_FILE_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15#include <stdio.h>
16
17#include <string>
18
19#include "api/rtc_event_log_output.h"
20#include "rtc_base/system/file_wrapper.h"
21
22namespace webrtc {
23
24class RtcEventLogOutputFile final : public RtcEventLogOutput {
25 public:
26 static const size_t kMaxReasonableFileSize; // Explanation at declaration.
27
28 // Unlimited/limited-size output file (by filename).
29 explicit RtcEventLogOutputFile(const std::string& file_name);
30 RtcEventLogOutputFile(const std::string& file_name, size_t max_size_bytes);
31
32 // Limited-size output file (by FILE*). This class takes ownership
33 // of the FILE*, and closes it on destruction.
34 RtcEventLogOutputFile(FILE* file, size_t max_size_bytes);
35
36 ~RtcEventLogOutputFile() override = default;
37
38 bool IsActive() const override;
39
40 bool Write(const std::string& output) override;
41
42 private:
43 RtcEventLogOutputFile(FileWrapper file, size_t max_size_bytes);
44
45 // IsActive() can be called either from outside or from inside, but we don't
46 // want to incur the overhead of a virtual function call if called from inside
47 // some other function of this class.
48 inline bool IsActiveInternal() const;
49
50 // Maximum size, or zero for no limit.
51 const size_t max_size_bytes_;
52 size_t written_bytes_{0};
53 FileWrapper file_;
54};
55
56} // namespace webrtc
57
58#endif // API_RTC_EVENT_LOG_OUTPUT_FILE_H_
59
